Class Signal

java.lang.Object
Signal
All Implemented Interfaces:
SignalInterface
public class Signal extends Object implements SignalInterface
A Java representation of one Mode 01 OBD signal and everything someone might need to know about it. Usually represented by one line in a DBC table.
